root: ^Hi Isaac, I'm back with the red flowers. Did you finally calm down?
^Y-yeah, I had some time to cool down.
^Also I think I know who this boquet is for.
^It's for Kat who works at the cafe, isn't it.
^Yeah, I have a slight crush on Kat. She's so nice and polite, whenever I'm reading and eating alone in the cafe,she would always walk up to me and keep me company.
^Also, doesn't help our village doesn't get many visitors, let alone customers.
^But do please keep this a secret, I'm already embarrassed with you knowing.
^Hehe, your secret is safe with me.
^Thanks, that means a lot. I guess our boquet still needs some work?
^Yeah, we need a few more flowers for it be to be ready for you to deliver.
^I'll come by tomorrow and let you know what we need next.
